roleset.name: make slow

roles.note: arg2 expected to occur particularly with adjectival relations

example.name: the one example
example.text: [Skilled ringers]-1 use their wrists *trace*-1 to advance or retard the next swing, so that one bell can swap places with another in the following change.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'retard' based on sentences in wsj. Adjectival 'retarded' found in BOLT-7.

example.name: adjectival rel: retarded
example.text: Either they are extremely shameless or extremely mentally retarded .
